si.title: ඩෙනියායා මැතිවරණ කොට් constituency ාශය දිශානුගත ලෙස ජය ගත්තේය

summary_lines: Here's a summary of "Deniyaya constituency won the directional" in approximately 200 characters:
"Deniyaya constituency secured victory in the directional race. This outcome reflects the community's preferences and political leanings."
